_header: Hail and holy ay be Thy name
Note: A type of acrostic, each stanza beginning with a word of ‘Heil Marie’ (1731).
Subjects: acrostics; Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary on the Angelic Salutation — fifteen 8-line stanzas (abababab)

CULGg432.First Lines:
Heil & holy ay be þi nameffulsum leuedi hende and
                    swete…
CULGg432.Last Lines:
…þat we þi blisse isemoten in heuenlich woniinge
                    Amen
